trans-unit.source: Represents an individual cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀을 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCell class represents an individual cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCell 클래스의 개별 셀을 나타냅니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: 셀 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> 의 컬렉션</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> 을 검색할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The row and column for a DataGridViewCell identify the cell's location in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCell에 대 한 열과 행 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 셀의 위치를 식별

trans-unit.source: A typical cell contains data specific to the row and column in which it is contained.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인 셀 포함 된 열과 행에 대 한 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The cell can be customized in a number of ways by setting its properties and handling the events associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 셀 속성을 설정 하 고 연결 된 이벤트를 처리 하 여 여러 가지 방법으로 사용자 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>에 할당 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: To control the instance returned from this method, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드에서 반환 되는 인스턴스를 제어 하려면 재정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: 없는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>현재 할당을 컨트롤의 새 인스턴스가 만들어집니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 가져오거나 설정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>속성에 대 한 참조를 추가 해야는 `Accessibility` 어셈블리와 함께 설치는 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 액세스 가능한 개체에 대 한 자세한 내용은 MSDN Library에서의 "Active Accessibility" 섹션을 참조 [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>에 할당 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Modifies the input cell border style according to the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 조건에 따라 입력된 셀 테두리 스타일을 수정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the AdjustCellBorderStyle method to determine the appearance of the cell borders.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>제어 셀 테두리의 모양을 결정 하는 AdjustCellBorderStyle 메서드를 내부적으로 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤의 값에 일반적으로 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>에 대 한 속성의 `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName> value is not supported as an input style for cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>값 셀에 대 한 입력된 스타일으로 지원 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the cell border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> 수정할 셀 테두리 스타일을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that is used to store intermediate changes to the cell border style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> 셀 테두리 스타일에 대 한 중간 변경 사항을 저장 하는 데 사용 되는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a vertical border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>셀;에 세로 테두리를 추가 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a horizontal border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>셀;에 가로 테두리를 추가 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>호스팅 셀이 처음 표시 되는 열에 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>호스팅 셀이 처음 표시 되는 행에 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The modified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 수정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 모든 셀 여백의 너비를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default width of the cell border is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: 셀 테두리의 기본 너비는 하나의 픽셀입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values to modify the width of the border: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value denotes a width of 0 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 다음을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>테두리의 두께 수정 하는 값:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>값은 0 픽셀 너비를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values increase the default width by 1 pixel.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>값 1 픽셀씩 기본 너비를 늘립니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> property is set for the cell's owning row, the rectangle's height is increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 또한 경우에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>소유 하는 셀의 행에 대 한 속성을 설정 하면 사각형의 높이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> 값 만큼 늘리는</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property is set for the cell's owning column, the rectangle's width will be increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 경우에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>소유 셀의 열에 대 한 속성을 설정 하면 사각형의 너비 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> 값 만큼 증가 합니다</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that the margins are to be calculated for.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> 여백은 계산할 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 모든 셀 여백의 너비를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 셀을 클릭할 때 셀의 행을 공유 하지 않을 것인지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The ClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ClickUnsharesRow 메서드 바로 전에 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: 반환 해야 `true` 하는 경우에 대 한 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>셀의 행을 공유 하지 않도록 하는 효과가.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 반환 해야 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 행 공유에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 크기 조정에 대 한 유용한](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> containing the data passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> 에 전달 된 데이터를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>행을 공유 하지 않을, 그렇지 않으면 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 기본 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> 클래스는 항상 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: 이 셀의 정확한 복사본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Clone 메서드를 재정의 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>파생된 클래스에 새 속성을 추가 하 고 클래스</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> 에서 파생 될 때마다

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>복제 된 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index for this cell.
trans-unit.target: 이 셀에 대 한 열 인덱스를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The column index for the row that contains the row headers has a value of -1.
trans-unit.target: 행 머리글이 포함 된 행에 대 한 열 인덱스의 값이-1입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column that contains the cell; -1 if the cell is not contained within a column.
trans-unit.target: 셀을 포함 하는 열의 인덱스 열에 셀이 포함 되지 않은 경우-1입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 내용 영역을 둘러싸는 경계 사각형을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle reports client coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 사각형 클라이언트 좌표 (픽셀)를 보고합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A> method to get its value.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는이 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A>메서드를 해당 값을 가져옵니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 기본 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>형식의 경우이 값은 <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> 에 대 한

trans-unit.source: To get the bounding rectangle of the cell rather than the cell contents, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 셀 내용이 아닌 셀의 경계 사각형을 사용은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 을 셀의 내용을 제한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 포함 된 공유 행이입니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: -또는-셀에 열 머리글 셀이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> property is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>속성은 셀을 행 머리글 셀을 나타내는 0 보다 작습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell's content is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 내용을 클릭할 때 셀의 행을 공유 하지 않을 것인지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The ContentClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ContentClickUnsharesRow 메서드 바로 전에 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: 반환 해야 `true` 하는 경우에 대 한 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>셀의 행을 공유 하지 않도록 하는 효과가.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 반환 해야 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 행 공유에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 크기 조정에 대 한 유용한](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> 에 전달 된 데이터를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick*>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick*>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>행을 공유 하지 않을, 그렇지 않으면 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 반환 해야 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀과 연결 된 바로 가기 메뉴를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the shortcut menu that is typically displayed when the user right-clicks the cell.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 셀을 마우스 오른쪽 단추로 클릭할 때 일반적으로 표시 되는 바로 가기 메뉴를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event of the control and returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property as specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>제어 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>속성을 설정 또는 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>속성은 `true`, ContextMenuStrip 속성 발생의 값을 가져오는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>컨트롤의 이벤트의 값을 반환 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성으로 지정한 이벤트 처리기.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: 이전에 지정 된 값 또는 그 기본값의 이벤트에 대 한 처리기가 없는 경우 ContextMenuStrip 속성의 값을 가져오면 반환 `null`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell ContextMenuStrip value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트는 여러 셀에 대 한 ContextMenuStrip 값 셀을 설정할 때 성능 저하를 방지 하기 위해 데이터를 대량으로 작업할 때 주로 유용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 크기 조정에 대 한 유용한](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Changing this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged> event on the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 변경 발생는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged>에서 소유 하 고 있는 이벤트 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>있는 경우.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 행을 설정 하 여 개별 셀 대신 개별 행에 대 한 바로 가기 메뉴를 지정할 수도 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>속성 또는 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell ContextMenuStrip property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 셀 ContextMenuStrip 속성 설정은 행을 재정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>속성 설정 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트 모두 재정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트와 행 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>속성을 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 지정할 수 있습니다 `null` 셀 바로 가기 메뉴를에 대 한 행 바로 가기 메뉴에서 재정의 되지 않도록 하려면.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> 셀과 연결 합니다.

trans-unit.target: 새 레코드에 대 한 행의 셀에 대 한 기본값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> 를 사용 하 여 작업을 마쳤으면 Dispose를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>불안정 한 상태가.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dispose를 호출한 후에 대 한 모든 참조를 해제 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>가비지 수집기는 메모리를 회수할 수 있도록 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>차지한.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 및 [Dispose 메서드를 구현](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> 에 대 한 마지막 참조를 해제 하기 전에 항상 호출 삭제

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 중인 리소스가 가비지 수집기 호출할 때까지 해제 되지 것입니다 그렇지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>개체의 `Finalize` 메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> 관리 되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 public `Dispose` 메서드 및 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.target: `Dispose`보호 된 호출 `Dispose(Boolean)` 메서드는 `disposing` 매개 변수 설정 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.

trans-unit.target: 경우는 `disposing` 매개 변수는 `true`,이 메서드는 관리 개체가 보유 하는 모든 리소스를 해제 합니다.이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>참조.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 호출에서 `Dispose` 각 참조 된 개체의 메서드.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>관리 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스만 해제 하려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> containing the data passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick*> method.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>행을 공유 하지 않을, 그렇지 않으면 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current, formatted value of the cell, regardless of whether the cell is in edit mode and the value has not been committed.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다 셀이 편집 모드에 있고 값에 있는지 여부와 관계 없이 셀의 현재, 형식이 지정 된 값이 커밋되지 않았는지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the current value of the cell or editing control if the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 현재 값을 반환 하는이 속성 또는 편집 컨트롤에 셀이 편집 모드입니다.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, getting the value of this property converts the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않은 경우이 속성의 값을 가져오는 값으로 변환 셀의 표시 된 형식 해당 하는 표시 값으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: 이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>값 변환 사용자 지정 하기 위해 처리할 수 있는 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 실패 한 경우 서식 지정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트 또는 처리기 집합에 대 한 처리기가 없는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 `true`, 예외가 throw 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The current, formatted value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 현재, 형식이 지정 된 값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 포함 된 공유 행이입니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: -또는-셀에 열 머리글 셀이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>셀이 행 머리글 셀을 나타내는 0 보다 작습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or the handler set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 형식 지정이 실패 하 고에 대 한 처리기가 없거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 컨트롤 또는 설정 처리기는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>속성을 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 예외 개체 <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException> 입력으로 일반적으로 캐스팅 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the cell's hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 호스팅된 편집 컨트롤의 형식을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A derived cell type overrides this property to return the type of its hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 셀 유형이 호스팅된 편집 컨트롤의 유형을 반환 하려면이 속성을 재정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the cell does not have an editing control, as with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, the EditType property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 셀 편집 컨트롤이 없는 경우와 마찬가지로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, EditType 속성이 반환 `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl"> </xref> 유형.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the parent row will be unshared when the focus moves to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 포커스가 셀으로 이동 하는 경우 부모 행을 공유 하지 않을 것인지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The EnterUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: EnterUnsharesRow 메서드 바로 전에 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 반환 해야 `true` 하는 경우에 대 한 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>셀이 포함 된 행을 공유 해제는 효과가.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 반환 해야 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 행 공유에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 크기 조정에 대 한 유용한](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 부모 행의 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user action moved focus to the cell; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a programmatic operation moved focus to the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>사용자 작업을 통해; 셀으로 포커스가 이동 하는 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 프로그래밍 작업 통해 포커스가 셀으로 이동 하는 경우.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>행을 공유 하지 않을; 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> 클래스는 항상 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the error icon for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀에 대 한 오류 아이콘의 범위를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle reports client coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 사각형 클라이언트 좌표 (픽셀)를 보고합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the value of this property is <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성은 `false`,이 속성의 값은 <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetErrorIconBounds%2A> method to get its value.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는이 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetErrorIconBounds%2A>메서드를 해당 값을 가져옵니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetErrorIconBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is always <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 기본에 대 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>형식,이 값은 항상 <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the error icon for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 현재에 대 한 오류 아이콘의 범위를 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The cell does not belong to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 셀에 속하지 않는 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: -또는- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>셀이 행 머리글 셀을 나타내는 0 보다 작습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 포함 된 공유 행이입니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: -또는-셀에 열 머리글 셀이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text describing an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀과 연결 된 오류 조건을 설명 하는 텍스트를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the ErrorText property is used when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: ErrorText 속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 이벤트</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> 를 처리할 때 사용 되는 일반적으로

trans-unit.source: If the cell's value fails some validation criteria, set the ErrorText property and cancel the commit operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 값에는 일부 유효성 검사 조건 실패 하면 ErrorText 속성을 설정 하 고 설정 하 여 커밋 작업을 취소할는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs>를 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text you specify is then displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, and the user is prompted to fix the error in the cell's data.
trans-unit.target: 하 여 지정한 텍스트가 표시 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, 사용자가 셀의 데이터에서 오류를 해결 하 라는 메시지가 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is `true`, you can provide error text for rows and cells using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> events.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>은 `true`, 행 및 사용 하 여 셀에 대 한 오류 텍스트를 제공할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you assign a different ErrorText string to a cell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: 셀에는 다른 ErrorText 문자열을 할당 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>제어 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, resizing of the error icon is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4.5.2 이상에서는 오류 아이콘의 크기 조정 따라 사용자가 시스템 DPI 설정을 app.config 파일에 다음 항목이 포함 되어 있는 경우:``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```

trans-unit.source: The text that describes an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀과 연결 된 오류 조건을 설명 하는 텍스트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 하 고 다른 정리 작업 전에 수행 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> 가비지 수집에서 회수 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> method with `false` as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>메서드를 `false` 매개 변수로.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 재정의 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 코드,이 메서드를 호출 하지 않아야 개체의 `Finalize` 메서드를 호출 하 여 가비지 수집기의 종료를 사용 하지 않도록 설정 된 경우가 아니면 자동으로 가비지 수집 중 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Finalize 메서드 및 소멸자](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), 및 [Finalize 메서드를 재정의](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell as formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: 형식이 지정 된 표시 셀의 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the FormattedValue is the formatted representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>는 FormattedValue이이 개체의 형식이 지정 된 표현인 반면 속성은 셀을 포함 하는 실제 데이터 개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>속성 각각 이러한 값의 데이터 형식에 해당 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of this property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method to convert the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값을 가져오는 호출는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>셀 값의 표시 된 형식 해당 표시 값으로 변환 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: 이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>값 변환 사용자 지정 하기 위해 처리할 수 있는 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 실패 한 경우 서식 지정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트 또는 처리기 집합에 대 한 처리기가 없는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 `true`, 예외가 throw 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The formatted value of the cell or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the cell does not belong to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 형식이 지정 된 값 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 셀에 속하지 않는 경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>셀이 행 머리글 셀을 나타내는 0 보다 작습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 포함 된 공유 행이입니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: -또는-셀에 열 머리글 셀이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or the handler set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 형식 지정이 실패 하 고에 대 한 처리기가 없거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 컨트롤 또는 설정 처리기는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>속성을 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 예외 개체 <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException> 입력으로 일반적으로 캐스팅 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the formatted value associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀과 관련 된 형식이 지정 된 값의 형식을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>속성은 셀을 포함 하는 실제 데이터 개체 이지만 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>속성은 데이터의 서식이 지정 된 표현입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and FormattedValueType properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>FormattedValueType 속성 각각 이러한 값의 데이터 형식에 따라.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the type of the cell's formatted value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>셀의 형식을 나타내는 형식이 지정 된 값.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is frozen.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 고정 되어 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Frozen property depends on the state of the cell's parent row and column.
trans-unit.target: Frozen 속성의 값 셀의 부모 행과 열의 상태에 따라 달라 집니다.

trans-unit.source: If the `Frozen` property of either the row or column is set to `true`, the cell's Frozen property will also be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 `Frozen` 행 이나 열의 속성이로 설정 되어 `true`, 셀의 Frozen 속성 됩니다 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is frozen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>셀이 고정 되어 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 복사할 셀의 형식이 지정 된 값을 검색 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to retrieve a Clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>셀 값을 나타내는 클립보드 형식의 값을 검색 하는 메서드입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The cell value is first retrieved in its display format from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 셀 값이 먼저 표시 형식에서 검색 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This may raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event to format the value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event if formatting is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 발생 시킬 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>값의 서식을 지정 하는 이벤트와 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>형식이 지정 되는 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드의 매개 변수 위치에 관련 된이 셀을 선택한 셀에 의해 정의 된 영역을 나타내는 데이터의 테이블에 있는 위치를 나타내는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the cell's position, additional formatting information may be returned by this method along with the display-formatted cell value.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 위치에 따라 서식 지정 정보 추가 셀 형식 지정 된 표시 값과 함께이 메서드에 의해 반환 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 행의 첫 번째 열에 셀에 대 한 HTML 형식에는 행의 시작 부분을 나타내는 태그가 포함 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The supported Clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 지원 되는 클립보드 형식으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> 를 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 포함 된 행의&0;부터 시작 하는 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the first column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>선택한 셀;에 정의 된 영역의 첫 번째 열에 셀 임을 나타내기 위해 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is the last column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>셀이 선택 된 셀;에 정의 된 영역의의 마지막 열 임을 나타내기 위해 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the first row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>선택한 셀;에 정의 된 영역의 첫 번째 행의 셀 임을 나타내기 위해 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the last row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>선택한 셀;에 정의 된 영역의 마지막 행의 셀 임을 나타내기 위해 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The current format string of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 현재 서식 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>복사할 셀의 값을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: rowIndex보다 작거나 0 보다 크거나 컨트롤의 행 수와 같고입니다.

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or the handler set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 예외 개체 <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException> 입력으로 일반적으로 캐스팅 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area using a default <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and cell style currently in effect for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 기본값을 사용 하 여 셀의 내용 영역을 둘러싸는 경계 사각형 반환 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 와 셀 스타일 현재 셀에 적용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The size of the cell's contents is computed dynamically when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 내용의 크기는이 메서드가 호출 될 때 동적으로 계산 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation always returns <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본 클래스 구현 시 항상 <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> 반환

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 부모 행의 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 을 셀의 내용을 제한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 rowIndex 가 0 보다 작거나 1 뺀 값 컨트롤의 행 수보다 큽니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>셀이 행 머리글 셀을 나타내는 0 보다 작습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and cell style.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된를 사용 하 여 계산 된 셀의 내용 영역을 둘러싸는 경계 사각형 반환 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 와 셀 스타일입니다.

trans-unit.source: The size of the cell's contents is computed dynamically when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 내용의 크기는이 메서드가 호출 될 때 동적으로 계산 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation always returns <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본 클래스 구현 시 항상 <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle?displayProperty=fullName> 반환

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A> property is read.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 내부적으로 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>속성은 읽기.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀에 대 한 그래픽 컨텍스트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> 셀에 적용 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 부모 행의 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 을 셀의 내용을 제한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current, formatted value of the cell, regardless of whether the cell is in edit mode and the value has not been committed.
trans-unit.target: 현재 형식이 지정 된 값을 셀이 있는지 여부와 관계 없이 셀의 편집 모드에 있고 값이 커밋되지 않았는지를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the current value of the editing cell or editing control if the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 편집 셀의 현재 값을 반환 하거나 편집 컨트롤에 셀이 편집 모드입니다.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method converts the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 셀 값 해당 표시 값으로 지정 된 형식의 변환 하는 그렇지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: 이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>값 변환 사용자 지정 하기 위해 처리할 수 있는 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 실패 한 경우 서식 지정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트 또는 처리기 집합에 대 한 처리기가 없는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 `true`, 예외가 throw 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes that override this method will typically return a string representation of the cell value if the `context` argument includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: 경우이 메서드를 재정의 하는 파생된 클래스에서 셀 값의 문자열 표현을 일반적으로 반환 됩니다는 `context` 인수에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 행 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values that specifies the data error context.
trans-unit.target: 비트 조합 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"> </xref> 데이터 오류 컨텍스트를 지정 하는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The current, formatted value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 현재, 형식이 지정 된 값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.

trans-unit.source: The styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A> property override the styles specified through all other cell-style properties, but do not necessarily indicate all the styles that contribute to the cell's appearance.
trans-unit.target: 통해 지정 된 스타일의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>속성 다른 셀 스타일 속성을 통해 지정 된 스타일을 재정의 하지만 셀의 모양에 영향을 주는 모든 스타일 나타내지는지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control used to edit the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀을 편집 하는 컨트롤을 초기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: As an optimization technique, typically all the cells of the same type and in the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> share a single hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 모든 셀 동일한 형식이 고 동일한 최적화 방법으로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>단일 공유 호스트 편집 컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, before the control is used by a cell, it needs to be initialized by the InitializeEditingControl method.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 컨트롤에 셀 사용 전에 InitializeEditingControl 메서드에 의해 초기화할 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The first time it is called, this method adds the control to the list of editing controls in its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 호출 되는 처음으로이 메서드는 부모 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 의 편집 컨트롤의 목록에는 컨트롤을 추가

trans-unit.source: It also initializes some of the visual properties of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 시각적 속성 중 일부를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, InitializeEditingControl sets the background color of the editing area to match the supplied cell style parameter.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 InitializeEditingControl는 제공 된 셀 스타일 매개 변수가 일치 하도록 편집 영역의 배경색을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to InitializeEditingControl do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 후속 호출 InitializeEditingControl 아무 작업도 수행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes use this method to host an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class corresponding to their type.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 호스트에이 메서드를 사용 하는 파생된 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>형식에 해당 하는 클래스입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For example, a table that contains one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> objects calls this method to add a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> editing control to the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 하나 이상의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>편집 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 소유 하는 컨트롤을</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> 단일를 추가 하려면이 메서드를 호출 하는 개체를</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> 포함 하는 테이블 예를 들어

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell's location.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 위치의&0;부터 시작 하는 행 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the value displayed by the cell when editing is started.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>편집이 시작 될 때 셀에 의해 표시 되는 값을 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> 셀의 스타일을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: There is no associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> or if one is present, it does not have an associated editing control.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 더 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 연결된 된 편집 컨트롤이 없는 있을 경우, 또는.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this cell is currently being edited.
trans-unit.target: 이 셀이 현재 편집 중인 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when you are working directly with cell instances.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 직접 셀 인스턴스를 사용 하 여 작업할 때 유용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=fullName> event to determine when the user enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 처리할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=fullName>사용자 편집 모드로 전환 하는 시기를 결정 하는 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>셀이 편집 모드에 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 포함 된 공유 행이입니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the parent row is unshared if the user presses a key while the focus is on the cell.
trans-unit.target: 포커스가 셀에 있는 동안 키를 누르는 경우 부모 행을 공유 하는지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The KeyDownUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: KeyDownUnsharesRow 메서드 바로 전에 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> argument has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 반환 해야 `true` 하는 경우에 대 한 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>동일한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>인수에 셀이 포함 된 행을 공유 하지 않도록 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 반환 해야 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 행 공유에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 크기 조정에 대 한 유용한](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines if edit mode should be started based on the given key.
trans-unit.target: 경우 편집 모드를 시작할지 지정된 된 키에 따라 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Override this method to create a custom cell that is editable.
trans-unit.target: 편집할 수 있는 사용자 지정 셀을 만들어서이 메서드를 재정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that represents the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> 누른 키를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if edit mode should be started; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우 편집 모드를 시작 해야 합니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared if a key is pressed while a cell in the row has focus.
trans-unit.target: 행의 셀에 포커스가 있을 때 키를 누를 경우 행을 공유 하지 않을 것인지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The KeyPressUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: KeyPressUnsharesRow 메서드 바로 전에 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, it must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 반환 해야 `true` 하는 경우에 대 한 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>셀이 포함 된 행을 공유 해제는 효과가.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 반환 해야 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 행 공유에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 크기 조정에 대 한 유용한](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.target: 포커스가 셀에 있는 동안 키를 놓을 때 부모 행을 공유 하지 않을 지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyUp%2A> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> argument has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 반환 해야 `true` 하는 경우에 대 한 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyUp%2A>동일한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>인수에 셀이 포함 된 행을 공유 하지 않도록 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: Converts a value formatted for display to an actual cell value.

trans-unit.source: When the user edits a cell value and commits the change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to convert the displayed value from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The control then sets the underlying cell value or data source value to the converted value.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the `formattedValue` parameter using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style indicated by the `cellStyle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드의 기본 구현 구문 분석 하는 `formattedValue` 매개 변수를 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>셀 스타일의 속성으로 표시는 `cellStyle` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `formattedValue` is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, this method returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> property or `null` if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> is <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> and the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> is a reference type.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `formattedValue` 같은지 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>의 값을 반환 하는이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>속성 또는 `null` 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>은 <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>및 셀 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>참조 형식인.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `formattedValue` is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, this method parses `formattedValue` using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the specified or default converters.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `formattedValue` 과 같지 않은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>,이 메서드는 구문 분석 `formattedValue` 를 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>속성과 지정 된 또는 기본 변환기.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> is nullable, this method wraps the return value as a <xref:System.Nullable%601> type.
